attributes.additional_details: Ensure the current work on the Bervie Braes allows it to be opened to light traffic.  If the current work will not guarantee this, then immediate remedial action must be taken.  This is the main tourist route from Dunnottar Castle into Stonehaven, Stonehaven a coastal tourist town.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Scottish Government (which has a separate petitions website).
